title: Leather Cloth
description: 3/8\" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp. 3/8-1/2\" tan, white, metallic bronze leather and/or vinyl & metallic braid, separated with 2 shots of black yarn form weft. Stapled to an 8.5x11\" card.  \"H-3\" printed on card. Light scrim glued to reverse. (black, tan, white,metallics)
